content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, nice to meet you. Let's discuss the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, how much are you offering for the apartment?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, I am not offering anything. I am renting an apartment. Therefore, I am asking for a price, not offering one. I am asking for 1000 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I think 1000 Euro per month is too expensive for the apartment. I am looking for something more affordable. How about 800 Euro per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe 800 Euro per month is too low for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, Mister Schmidt. How about we meet in the middle? 900 Euro per month would be a fair price for both parties, don't you think?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [900] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Great, Mister Schmidt! We have a deal at 900 Euro per month. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
